apiDoc.name: NegentropySyncProgressAnimated
apiDoc.description: Animated negentropy sync progress display with gradient background and shimmer effects. Features pulsing status indicator, animated shimmer background during sync, large percentage display, and detailed relay/item statistics. Includes green completion indicator and blue pulsing active state. Perfect for onboarding flows or prominent sync status displays.
